description: Try our easy to follow Hamburger With The Works recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
name: Hamburger With The Works Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Spread roll bases with mayonnaise. Top with salad, tomato, beetroot, pattie, pineapple, egg and bacon. Season with cracked pepper. Serve with crisps.
